comment:
>>38007089

"Alright, then. Follow me, and stay quiet. Let's not have the Nameless catch us out." You say, quietly closing the drawer before turning on a heel and sliding out of the building and back into the alleys adjacent, maintaining the same formation as before.

You stop in the corner of the alley across the street from the large warehouse, catching a pair of Nameless sprinting around toward the ground entrance from the street. There's the sound of a door slamming, and you stick your head out just in time to see a woman with brilliant red hair and a UI dangling around her waist vanish through the upper warehouse entrance.

A shout from inside, followed by a quick burst of caster fire that blasts out one of the upper windows.

> Head for the ground entrance and sneak in.
> Head for the ground entrance and ambush the Nameless.
> Head for the scaffolding entrance.
> Other.
name: BSO
